mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT DISTINCT SU.* FROM sys_user_role UR LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu RM ON UR.role_id = RM.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user SU ON UR.user_id = SU.id WHERE RM.menu_id = #{menuId};

SELECT DISTINCT su.wos_id FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON su.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = ur.role_id WHERE sr.code = 'operator' AND su.statu = 1 AND su.wos_id IS NOT NULL ;
